waidya harischandra mahatha wisin mulinma liyana lada granthaya wuye ‘jathaka katha pilibanda mano widyathmaka hari balimak’ namathi ingrisi granthayayi. 2000 warshayedi liyana lada ema granthayata 2010 warshaye rajya sammanaya labini.
